monogr.title: Drum Beats: Walt Whitman's Civil War Boy Lovers

bibl.author: Manvill Wintersteen
bibl.title: Manvill Wintersteen to Walt Whitman, 1 March 1875
bibl.idno: Berg Coll MSS Whitman Series IV
bibl.orgName: The Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature, New York Public Library

revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

body.p: I received your card was glad to herehear from a soldierssoldier's friend in time of need and if you are the friend that took care of me I am glad to herehear from you I can not place you as I did not learn your name but haventhaven't forgot the kindness I recivedreceived while in the ArmyArmory Square Hospital I would like to see you
I draw a small pencionpension am owing to york State grafting in a boutabout 3 weeks
I guess you are the friend that wrote a letter for me when I first came to the hospitalI am glad to herehear from eny oneanyone write again
